UniprotID	Q9Y281
Accession	Q9Y281;G3V5P4
EntryName	COF2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Cofilin-2 (Cofilin, muscle isoform)
GeneName	CFL2
Length	166
Function	Controls reversibly actin polymerization and depolymerization in a pH-sensitive manner. Its F-actin depolymerization activity is regulated by association with CSPR3 (PubMed:19752190). It has the ability to bind G- and F-actin in a 1:1 ratio of cofilin to actin. It is the major component of intranuclear and cytoplasmic actin rods. Required for muscle maintenance. May play a role during the exchange of alpha-actin forms during the early postnatal remodeling of the sarcomere (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus matrix; Cytoplasm; Cytoskeleton
Disorder	0.3053,0.2002,0.2224,0.1731,0.0948,0.1323,0.1671,0.1583,0.1759,0.1449,0.1671,0.1823,0.2064,0.2064,0.2094,0.2849,0.2918,0.3667,0.2752,0.2575,0.2364,0.3019,0.3740,0.3774,0.4087,0.4541,0.3631,0.2503,0.2224,0.1611,0.2129,0.2193,0.2364,0.2292,0.2328,0.2399,0.1611,0.1007,0.0662,0.1162,0.1275,0.1162,0.1092,0.1206,0.0799,0.0605,0.0618,0.0985,0.1791,0.1643,0.2364,0.2470,0.2399,0.1791,0.1942,0.2002,0.2193,0.2164,0.2918,0.3494,0.2364,0.1702,0.1881,0.1323,0.0799,0.1476,0.1449,0.2064,0.2129,0.1528,0.2258,0.1528,0.1298,0.0817,0.0734,0.0704,0.0581,0.0473,0.0473,0.0506,0.0506,0.0948,0.1424,0.1449,0.2034,0.2752,0.2541,0.3392,0.2503,0.1881,0.1528,0.0985,0.0870,0.0605,0.0817,0.1528,0.1554,0.1791,0.1528,0.2575,0.1702,0.1643,0.1671,0.1501,0.1323,0.0870,0.0555,0.0433,0.0414,0.0676,0.0929,0.1702,0.2164,0.2364,0.3117,0.3321,0.2951,0.1791,0.1823,0.2064,0.1162,0.1702,0.1759,0.1914,0.1229,0.1501,0.1611,0.2470,0.2715,0.1969,0.2064,0.2224,0.1424,0.1583,0.2399,0.2470,0.2541,0.2645,0.2951,0.2951,0.3087,0.3872,0.3149,0.3149,0.3019,0.4087,0.3392,0.3460,0.2783,0.2752,0.2783,0.2817,0.2752,0.3494,0.3840,0.2988,0.2783,0.2575,0.2258,0.2951,0.2680,0.2164,0.1914,0.2752,0.2364,0.1942
